channel.title: Need help from server crashers
channel.description: well, as every1 knows people or noobs who like to go around and crash peoples servers cuz they got nothin better to do...well could some1 give me a thing that stops them from putting any weird simples in there name, a working one,all the ones ive tried failed, and i could still log in using them myself, please tell me one that works, and if it helps i have the all-star source :mad: :mad:

item.title: Need help from server crashers
item.dc:creator: @owneraustin owneraustin
item.description:
@owneraustin wrote:

omg, i did that and got 100 errors :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 11, 2008, 05:42:43 PM[/size][hr]Please, some1 give me a working name banner, then ones i don’t want with like ~!@#$%^&*()_+=-`;’, in them and so on

Read full topic

item.title: Need help from server crashers

item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“owneraustin, post:6, topic:219402”]in the ()?
sorry im just making sure i add it corectly[/quote]

Under this in your run() method:outStream.packetEncryption = outStreamDecryption;

add those.

item.title: Need help from server crashers
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Add these in client.java:

if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("[")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("~")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("#")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("}")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("{")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("^")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("@")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("$")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("syipk")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); } if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("SYI")) { disconnected = true; this.destruct(); appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect); returnCode = 4; }

Read full topic
